name: RELAY (rakan)
description:
RELAY is an 2-player arcade versus game  for those of us who wish to be the best in attack AND defense ! 

Indeed, in RELAY, each player takes on a role : Attacker or Defender.

  • The Attacker is only able to move, while shooting bullets automatically. 
  • The Defender is able to move and dash to intercept the enemy's bullets.

And all of this with only one button per player !

RELAY's main feature is that every 15 seconds, the players switch their role !

The game has been realised alone by myself, during my first year of game design at school.
